metadata.title: Supplementary Information 6: Evidence Narratives for Additional Feline Infections Vector-borne agents Leishmaniasis

abstract.original_text: One case report identified a cat with visceral leishmaniosis and concurrent pancytopenia thought to be of immune-mediated origin, 1 yielding an IME value of 2.62. The cat had persistent autoagglutination, and Leishmania amastigotes were identified in the bone marrow, peripheral blood, and other body tissues.

sentences.segment_text: One case report identified a cat with visceral leishmaniosis and concurrent pancytopenia thought to be of immune-mediated origin ,
and Leishmania amastigotes were identified in the bone marrow ,
peripheral blood , and other body tissues .
